      • getRoot

        public static DomElement getRoot(DomElement domElement)
        Parameters:
        domElement - DomElement to search root of
        Returns:
        the topmost valid DomElement being a parent of the given one. May be and may be not DomFileElement. If root tag has changed, file may lose its domness, so there will be no DomFileElement, but the inner DomElement's will be still alive because the underlying XML tags are valid

      • hasXml
